title: 24-hour water cut in several areas in Colombo
body_lines: The water supply has been interrupted for 24 hours from now onwards for several areas owing to a sudden breakdown of a pipeline, the National Water Supply & Drainage Board (NWSDB) said.
Accordingly, the water supply would be supply in Dehiwala & Mt Lavinia MC area, Ratmalana, Colombo 05, Colombo 06, Battaramulla, Pelawatta, Udumulla, Himbutana areas.
